education.degree: Master of Science in Data Analytics Engineering
Bachelor of Technology, Electronics and Communication Engineering

responsibilities: Customized oracle banking application using JAVA and PL/SQL, optimizing it to align with client-specific requirements and to enhance the overall system performance for improved operational efficiency.

Developed custom solutions in the OBPM module of Oracle Flexcube to automate and streamline MX payment messages for creditors and debtors, improving transaction efficiency and compliance with payment standards.

Analyzed the client needs by collaborating with cross-functional teams, holding daily meetings and task updates, to gather precise client specifications and define targeted customization requirements, hence ensuring seamless alignment between development and client needs.
Maintained Oracle Database systems to ensure high availability and performance for critical financial applications.

academic_projects.title: F1 Team Performance Tracker
description: Developing an F1 Team Performance Data Management System that tracks and analyzes key performance metrics, including team standings, driver results and race statistics using advanced database management.
Leveraged SQL for data querying and analytics thus supporting data-driven decision-making for optimizing team performance across multiple seasons.

academic_projects.title: Advanced Waste Segregation
description: Developed a machine learning-based waste classification system using CNN, and integrated it with Raspberry Pi 4B, to automate real-time sorting of recyclable and organic waste.
Used Pi Camera to capture the image of the waste, and used servo motors powered by Raspberry Pi to automate the process.

academic_projects.title: Crime Data Analysis
description: Data-driven analysis of crime trends, using time-series analysis leveraging predictive modelling to forecast future crime patterns.

Visualized trends, patterns, and regional crime variation using interactive plotly.express graphs to analyze the crime data, enabling stakeholders to identify hotspots and understand spatial and temporal dynamics through intuitive visualizations.
Forecasted future crime rates using predictive models such as ARIMA, generating a detailed report with key insights to generate data-driven decision-making and proactive law enforcement strategies.

academic_projects.title: Customer Segmentation Using RFM Analysis
description: Performed Customer Segmentation using RFM Analysis to classify ecommerce customers based on purchasing behaviour, leveraging Python for data preprocessing, RFM metric computation, and clustering techniques (e.g., K-Means) to identify actionable customer groups.

Developed data-driven marketing strategies by profiling customer segments, visualizing RFM distribution and cluster insights, and providing targeted recommendations to improve customer retention and revenue growth.

academic_projects.title: EEG Classification Model
description: Built an EEG classification model using CNN machine learning algorithm, applying preprocessing, feature extraction (RQA, Recurrence Network), and data augmentation for enhanced accuracy in medical diagnostics.
Optimized model performance through dropout, early stopping, and hyperparameter tuning, achieving strong evaluation metrics on training, validation, and test sets.

academic_projects.title: Real-Time Data Pipeline with Kafka, Spark, and BigQuery
description: Implemented a real-time data pipeline to ingest, transform, and store streaming data for efficient analytics and decision-making.

Built a scalable data pipeline using Kafka for real-time data ingestion, PySpark for transformation, and BigQuery for storage, enabling seamless processing of streaming data from Google Cloud Storage.
Optimized data transformation workflows with PySpark, ensuring data quality and scalability, and wrote cleaned data back to BigQuery for real-time analytics and reporting.
